\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	&&&&& X \\
	M && C && {\mathrm{cok}(i)} & P \\
	M && {M_C} && {M_B}
	\arrow[dashed, from=1-6, to=2-3]
	\arrow[from=1-6, to=2-5]
	\arrow[dashed, from=1-6, to=2-6]
	\arrow["i", from=2-1, to=2-3]
	\arrow[equals, from=2-1, to=3-1]
	\arrow[two heads, from=2-3, to=2-5]
	\arrow[from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow[from=2-5, to=3-5]
	\arrow[dashed, from=2-6, to=3-3]
	\arrow[dashed, from=2-6, to=3-5]
	\arrow[from=3-1, to=3-3]
	\arrow[two heads, from=3-3, to=3-5]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
